name: cpy-machine-test
description: CLIENT SIDE 1.  cd...to client 2.  npm start 3.  register a admin use the checkbox on the UI. 4. Go ManageProduct Link on the nav bar. 5. Add each products with details / otherway you check the point number:4 (SERVER SIDE). 6. You can edit, update and delete products Only Admins. 7. Users have to deal cart, products details and wishlist features.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
